analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xcca0fde6a5c9941d4779c1c02c5c6c625756396a.sol:
	Contract IMCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xcca0fde6a5c9941d4779c1c02c5c6c625756396a.sol#355-359)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

IMCIssuingRecord.sendTokenToPlatform (/unique_chucks/21/0xcca0fde6a5c9941d4779c1c02c5c6c625756396a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-imcToken.transfer(platformAddr,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0xcca0fde6a5c9941d4779c1c02c5c6c625756396a.sol)
